fields.summary: The default value of "hadoop.workaround.non.threadsafe.getpwuid" is different between core-default.xml and NativeIO.java

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The property as defined in core-default.xml is

bq.  hadoop.work.around.non.threadsafe.getpwuid

But in NativeIO.java (the only place I can see a similar reference), the property is defined as:

bq.     static final String WORKAROUND_NON_THREADSAFE_CALLS_KEY = "hadoop.workaround.non.threadsafe.getpwuid";

Note the extra period (.) in the word "workaround".

Should the code be made to match the property or vice versa?

comments.body: 2.8.0 is not released yet, change to 2.7.1
- Fix the property in NativeIO.java.  Following the convention that we should stay backwards compatible to the property name as shown in the xml file.

RE: No new tests

Fixing property name in .xml file

RE: Failing unit tests

Unit tests pass in my tree.

FAILURE: Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #9193 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/9193/])
HADOOP-12735. core-default.xml misspells (cmccabe: rev 2e8ab3d46568162af6aa90b612ed61d487e7c7b0)
* hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/CHANGES.txt
* hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/resources/core-default.xml
Thanks for the feedback and the commit!

Thanks [~rchiang] and [~cmccabe] for fixing this issue.
I found the default value in core-default.xml is different from that in NativeIO.java, so I filed HADOOP-12766 and created a patch. Would you please review it?
